name: $value
desc: Returns: The value for this stratum, expressed as a CodeableConcept. When defining stratifiers on complex values, the value must be rendered such that the value for each stratum within the stratifier is unique.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The value for this stratum, expressed as a CodeableConcept. When defining stratifiers on complex values, the value must be rendered such that the value for each stratum within the stratifier is unique.

name: $population
desc: Returns: The populations that make up the stratum, one for each type of population appropriate to the measure.

name: $addpopulation
desc: The populations that make up the stratum, one for each type of population appropriate to the measure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The populations that make up the stratum, one for each type of population appropriate to the measure.

name: $measureScore
desc: Returns: The measure score for this stratum, calculated as appropriate for the measure type and scoring method, and based on only the members of this stratum.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The measure score for this stratum, calculated as appropriate for the measure type and scoring method, and based on only the members of this stratum.
